attributes.action: We need an urgent general election to bring stability to the UK
attributes.additional_details: This chaos cannot continue indefinitely and we need an urgent general election sooner rather than later to bring some stability to the UK government.
attributes.background: The time has come to stop the chaotic form of leadership and government from the Conservative party and hold an urgent general election. Thus will allow the Uk electorate to decide the way forward.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/619781
